subject: Re: [junit] verbose output from assert?
msgSnippet: ... Most of us just want to know one thing: all tests passed? Ron Jeffries www.XProgramming.com Sigs are like I Ching or Tarot. They don t mean anything, but
messageBody:
On Friday, February 13, 2004, at 1:45:22 PM, Ray Kiddy wrote:

> Is there a reason this rather simple extension is not in the junit
> classes?

Most of us just want to know one thing: all tests passed?

Ron Jeffries
www.XProgramming.com
Sigs are like I Ching or Tarot. They don't mean anything,
but sometimes if you think about them you'll get a useful idea.
